= Scheme =
Description of available Xattrs:

|| *Mult* || *1stLetter* || *Widget* || *DataType* ||
|| - || B || CheckBox || bool ||
|| + || R || RadioButton || int + enum ||
|| + || L/E || List || str + enum ||
|| + ||   || Tree || str + ? ||
|| + || S || Lineedit || str ||
|| - || H || TextEdit || html ||
|| - || T || PlainTextEdit || text ||
|| + || I || SpinBox || int ||
|| + || F || DoubleSpinBox || float ||
|| + || D || Date || date ||
|| + || M || Time || time ||
|| + ||   || DateTime || datetime ||
|| - || G || Image || image ||
|| + || X || Href || URL ||

Common attributes:
  * ID:string - uniq name
  * Label:string(utf8)
  * Mandatory:bool

Widgets can present 0, 1 or many times - but not all of them.
Plural Xattrs stores in one xattr and sre separated dependently of datatype.
Widget and data type encoded in 1st letter of xattr name.
